SELECT T1.*, T3.PAY_TYPE, T3.PAY_TYPE_NAME FROM T_ORDER_EXCEPTION T1 LEFT JOIN T_ORDER T2 ON T1.ORDER_ID = T2.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN T_SYSTEM_PAY_TYPE T3 ON T2.PAY_TYPE_ID = T3.PAY_TYPE_ID WHERE T1.ORDER_STATUS = '4' AND T1.CUST_ID = #{custId} AND T1.EXCEPTION_ORDER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{exceptionOrderId},'%' ) AND T1.FLOW_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{flowId},'%' ) AND T1.SUPPLY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{supplyName},'%' )
AND T1.ORDER_CREATE_TIME >= #{startTime}
AND T1.ORDER_CREATE_TIME <= #{endTime}
T1.ORDER_STATUS = '1'
( (T1.ORDER_STATUS = '2' AND (T3.PAY_TYPE = 1 OR T3.PAY_TYPE = 2)) OR (T1.ORDER_STATUS = '4' AND T3.PAY_TYPE = 3) )
T1.ORDER_STATUS = '2' AND T3.PAY_TYPE = 3
T1.ORDER_STATUS = '3'
T1.EXCEPTION_ID IS NULL
ORDER BY T1.EXCEPTION_ID DESC
